title: Runic Echoes v Cinderhulk
body:
Has someone (on reddit or somewhere) done the math on Runic Echoes v Cinderhulk on certain Junglers.

Champions like {{champion:79}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:113}} etc.

I see a lot of Runic Echoes on these champions now. Just curious about the math behind it. Thought I'd ask before putting in the time to do it myself.

replies.body: It's usually RE into a DMP.

as someone pointed out its just far to weak and you would be better getting runic echo and {{item:3068}}  as everything about it is better

 the passive is pretty bad compared : sf cape does 25+1 per champ lvl , cinderhulk does 15+.6 per level.

Yeah what I read was the bonus % HP got nerfed too much. Was just curious if there were actual statistics behind it.

I've read the math behind Fervor > Thunderlords thought there might be something similar here
it does need a slight buff.
